stereopsis.settings.title: Stereopsis Config
stereopsis.settings.flipView.description: Switch between cross mode or parallel mode (Experimental).
stereopsis.settings.enableOnLaunch.descr: If enabled, stereopsis will enable automatically on game launch.
stereopsis.settings.magicFixForShaders.d: This takes around 0.8% of performance (no other mod, new world, no shaders). If you're using shader pack, you probably want this to be on. Also disable motion blur if the shader pack have it. It will (hopefully) fix shader rendering problem. I (dev) have no idea how this works, so it's a magic fix.
stereopsis.settings.maxXOffset.descripti: The max offset for the view to focus on the crosshair.
